attributes.action: Give all healthcare workers including Nurses and Junior doctors a pay rise
attributes.additional_details: Even though nurses received a package deal 3 years ago they did not take into consideration they might be putting their life and their families at risk. Nurses are now the lowest paid semi professional.
attributes.background: Give a pay rise to Nurses and Junior Doctors due to their contribution during Covid pandemic. These are the staff members who attended work every shift during the worse days of this pandemic and are left feeling as though we have been forgotten. We have been totally disregarded by the government
